description: This file contains the implementation of SearchFragment, a UI component in an Android application that provides product search functionality. It initializes a ViewModel, sets up a RecyclerView with a ProductAdapter, and handles user input to trigger search queries.

classes.name: SearchFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that provides a UI for searching products, handling user input, and displaying search results.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes the RecyclerView, adapters, input listeners, and observes ViewModel results to update UI.
